name: ROBOJOIN
description:
-----| CONTROLS |------

  • WASD = movement
  • Space = Double Jump
  • Tab = Disconnect
  • 1 & 2 Top number keys = Switch between control of Upper and Lower body.
  • Left Mouse Click = Shoot eye blast!

-----|Browser Lagging?  Watch the full playthrough here. |------

-----|STORY |------

ROBOJOIN! A young robot is trapped on a planet.  Luckily ROBOJOIN can break in half at will! Plus, can easily JOIN BACK TOGETHER!  Help them figure out the puzzles of the forest!

-----|ABOUT |------

This was the first idea I had so I went with it! A lot of the art I did quickly by using sprite sheet references.  The BG is from a metroidvania asset pack that I slightly reworked/colored and added more layers.  Half the code is reworked from a platforming game I made for Steam :D  I spent most my time figuring out the splitting mechanic code.  Once that was done I did level design.

Check out my game dev YouTube here: https://www.youtube.com/neatgames

Currently I'm making my 2nd Steam game and 1st Mobile game. :D
